scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:loan && npm run build:loanToHtml && npm run min
scripts.build:loan: rollup lib/loan.js --name loan --format iife --output dist/loan.js && babel -o dist/loan.js dist/loan.js
scripts.build:loanToHtml: rollup lib/loanToHtmlTable.js --name loanToHtmlTable --format iife --output dist/loanToHtmlTable.js && babel -o dist/loanToHtmlTable.js dist/loanToHtmlTable.js
scripts.min: npm run min:loan && npm run min:loanToHtml
